column4: Hey better than the days when it wasn't just one site that was wrong, but when only one site, or document was correct.
make or make install, probably not hard to remember.
it was no that easy. i recall i had to get the headers or something like that, then i had to change some lines on the scripts, then make
Ouch. Well, hopefully it won't be as hard the second time around. Good luck with it.
